Package businesslogic

Class OrderBLL

java.lang.Object
businesslogic.OrderBLL
public class OrderBLL
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to verify the validity of the commands specific for orders and to execute them.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) static int billIndex
    index used to change the number at the end of each bill pdf file
    (package private) static int orderReportIndex
    index used to change the number at the end of each order report pdf file
    (package private) static int underStockIndex
    index used to change the number at the end of each under-stock pdf file

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    OrderBLL()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void generateBill​(Order order, float productPrice)
    generates the bill pdf
    void generateUnderStock​(java.lang.String command)
    generates the under-stock pdf file in case of unavailable quantity
    void insertOrder​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> splitString, java.lang.String command)
    verifies the insert order command syntax and, if correct, executes it
    void reportOrder​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> splitString)
    verifies the report order command syntax and, if correct, generates the necessary pdf file

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • insertOrder

      public void insertOrder​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> splitString, java.lang.String command)
      verifies the insert order command syntax and, if correct, executes it
      Parameters:
      splitString - the command parsed into several necessary fields
      command - the command non-parsed, placed in the under-stock pdf file to see which command could not be executed due to unavailable quantity

    • generateBill

      public void generateBill​(Order order, float productPrice)
      generates the bill pdf
      Parameters:
      order - the order to be put in the bill
      productPrice - final price of the order

    • generateUnderStock

      public void generateUnderStock​(java.lang.String command)
      generates the under-stock pdf file in case of unavailable quantity
      Parameters:
      command - the command non-parsed, placed in the under-stock pdf file to see which command could not be executed due to unavailable quantity

    • reportOrder

      public void reportOrder​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> splitString)
      verifies the report order command syntax and, if correct, generates the necessary pdf file
      Parameters:
      splitString - the command parsed into several necessary fields
